metadata.title: Influenza vaccine coverage rates and perceptions on vaccination in South Korea

abstract.original_text: Conclusions: Doctor's recommendation was the most important factor in encouraging people to be vaccinated against influenza. Doctors should be geared up with precise information and actively encourage high risk population in order to increase vaccination coverage.

sentences.segment_text: Conclusions : Doctor 's recommendation was the most important factor in encouraging people to be vaccinated against influenza .
Doctors should be geared up with precise information and actively encourage high risk population in order to increase vaccination coverage .
